comments.html:
<quote>
A typical networking device (bridge, router, switch, LSR ...) has control and data plane.

You missed the management plane!</quote>
comments.name: PH

comments.html: You're absolutely correct, but I didn't want to go there as OpenFlow works between control and data plane.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Is it correct to say that we can isolate the control plane and the data plane using OpenFLow? And what that exactly means?
comments.name: Shahryar Ali
